alert.note: Alert for San Augustine (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 12:20AM CST until March 03 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR CENTRAL DE SOTO...NORTHWESTERN RED RIVER...SOUTHEASTERN CADDO... SOUTHEASTERN BOSSIER AND NORTHWESTERN SABINE PARISHES...SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY...EAST CENTRAL SAN AUGUSTINE AND NORTHERN SABINE COUNTIES... At 1219 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stonewall to near Rosevine, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Mansfield, Milam, Zwolle, Converse, Oak Grove, Huxley, South Mansfield, Noble, Grand Cane, Carmel, Curtis, Kingston, Koran, Ninock, Pelican, Mc Dade, Reeds Store and Frierson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
